title: Visual Expertise Development Training for Large-Scale Medical Imaging Interpretation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and physiological structure comprehension
context.additional_context: Structured medical imaging interpretation skill development through digital microlearning modules; corporate training program for entry-level medical/technical professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify basic abnormal patterns in EKG and CXR images with 80% accuracy within three days.
Learners can shorten image interpretation response times by 20% through five days of visual processing task training.
Learners identify professional differences among three video types (tutorials, demos, reviews) with 80% accuracy and self-assess diagnostic abilities using a 5-item checklist.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
